name: Farmer_markets_Prediction
description: farmer markets prediction in each zipcode with the of help tax data

fields.name: dataset
fields.title: Dataset
fields.description: Selected Dataset

nodes.name: ColumnFilter
nodes.description: This node creates a new DataFrame that contains only the selected columns

fields.name: columns
fields.title: Columns
fields.description: Columns to be included in the output DataFrame

nodes.name: SQL
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value: select zipcode, sum(MARS1) as single_returns, sum(MARS2) as joint_returns, sum(NUMDEP) as numdep, sum(A02650) as total_income_amount, sum(A00300) as taxable_interest_amount from fire_temp_table group by zipcode
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.name: columns
fields.value: zipcode single_returns joint_returns numdep total_income_amount taxable_interest_amount

fields.description: New Output Columns of the SQL

fields.value: int double double double double double

fields.name: dataset
fields.title: Dataset
fields.description: Selected Dataset

nodes.name: SQL
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value: select cast(zip as int) as zip, count(*) as count from fire_temp_table group by zip
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.name: columns
fields.title: SQL Output Column Names separated by space
fields.description: New Output Columns of the SQL

fields.name: columnTypes
fields.title: SQL Output Column Types separated by space
fields.description: Data Type of the Output Columns

nodes.name: JoinUsingSQL
nodes.description: This node creates a new DataFrame by performing Inner Join or Left Outer Join or Right Outer Join or Full Outer Join

fields.name: tempTable1
fields.title: Temp Table1
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: tempTable2
fields.title: Temp Table2
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value: select  a.zipcode , a.single_returns, a.joint_returns, a.numdep, a.total_income_amount, a.taxable_interest_amount, b.count, b.zip from  fire_temp_table1 a LEFT OUTER JOIN fire_temp_table2 b ON(a.zipcode=b.zip)
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.name: columns
fields.value: zipcode single_returns joint_returns numdep total_income_amount taxable_interest_amount count zip

fields.description: New Output Columns of the SQL

fields.value: int double double double double double long int

fields.description: Data Type of the Output Columns

fields.description: The label column for model fitting

fields.title: Prediction Columns
fields.description: The prediction column created during model scoring

fields.name: fitIntercept
fields.title: Fit Intercept
fields.description: Whether to fit an intercept term

fields.name: maxIter
fields.title: Maximum Iterations
fields.description: Maximum number of iterations (>= 0)

fields.name: regParam
fields.title: Regularization Param
fields.description: The regularization parameter

fields.name: elasticNetParam
fields.title: ElasticNet Param
fields.description: The ElasticNet mixing parameter. For alpha = 0, the penalty is an L2 penalty. For alpha = 1, it is an L1 penalty

fields.name: solver
fields.title: Solver
fields.description: The solver algorithm for optimization

fields.name: standardization
fields.title: Standardization
fields.description: Whether to standardize the training features before fitting the model

fields.name: tol
fields.title: Tolerance
fields.description: The convergence tolerance for iterative algorithms

fields.name: weightCol
fields.title: Weight Column
fields.description: If the 'weight column' is not specified, all instances are treated equally with a weight 1.0
